page.title: 18DAY IN THE LIFE OF THE VICAR
page.content: On the sixteenth of July,we went over to Wilmcote vicarage to interview the {Vicar of Wilmcote}about his day. He prays to God at 7:25am and then has breakfast and goes to{Holy Communion {Service.}He also types letters and checks that every thing is alright. Father Nick likes the job because he goes to see people and gets to know them.He goes to lots of meetings in the evening and sometimes has meetings in the day.He decided that he would become a{priest}when he was 11 years old.Father Nick has one day off which is usually Thursday.He likes to finish at 9:00pm, but sometimes he is with people until 11:00pm.Father Nick gets paid Â£7,000 a year but he does not have to buy his house.{Father Nick}is 39 years old,and has four children.
